summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 243 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 958 m), feels like temperature (up 2.0°C), inside temperature (up 1.6°C), and outside temperature (up 1.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 242.7m lower than yesterday, 75.4m lower than the past week, 958.3m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 745m to a maximum of 3580m, averaging 1743.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1819.1m and 2700m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Periods of rain anticipated, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and strong and powerful sunlight. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
